You want Cuanto <http://cuanto.codehaus.org>, which was designed for storin=
g
test results and analysis. It has an Ant task you can use to push your JU=
nit
results into it. Very superior to HTML reports, in my humble opinion, b=
ut
then again, I'm the author ;-)
